message: P.S. I want to build a breakfast fortress.
The only way I've found is to click 'invite members', top right. That'll give you the people you know from elsewhere.
Is there a way to see who from my social graph is on Convore?
Yes it would be nice to put anyone who said something interesting into friend list. But this is the reason why i have Twitter :-)
@xyentific Clicking "Discover" at the top will show you all the groups your friends are in.
@ericflo More like just a list of my friends on Convore - not specific to any certain group without having to attempt to Invite people
@xyentific Is that what you're referring to?
@xyentific Ahh I see, nope, nothing quite like that right now
